description: A micro-lesson that makes Creatine the Proven Performer usable.

hook.text: Creatine is the most researched supplement in sports science. It actually works and it's safe.

buildup.text: Creatine increases phosphocreatine in muscles, providing more fuel for short explosive efforts.

discovery.text: Studies consistently show creatine improves strength, power, and high-intensity exercise by 5 to 15%.

twist.text: Despite decades of safety data, kidney damage myths persist. Research confirms no harm in healthy adults.
